title: Need Help with Your New Invention? Idea Design Studio Will Help You Create the Next Big Thing
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Idea Design Studio 
MIAMI, Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- 
Idea Animation 
Creating the next great big idea is an enormous feat. But animation to present your idea is equally important. In order to successfully market this new idea, a presentation, involving animation, is needed. 3D designs are often used in this type of animation, which aids in the breakdown of what the invention actually does. Idea Design Studio is able to focus on several things while working on your idea's animation. Those areas include state of the art 3D animation, displaying the benefits of the invention and the ability to show the movements of your invention. Coupled with professional sound designs and the team's award-winning creativity, inventors can watch their idea come to life. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150924/270332LOGO 
3-D 
When new products and designs are featured on television, they are actually 3D designs. Idea Design Studio has a team of experts ready to walk new inventors through the process. The award-winning team has a plan, and here is what it entails. First, the team communicates with the inventor via a conference call and over the course of the discussion a pre-sketch emerges. Then, through the creation of an online project management system, clients and the design team can communicate and view the work. After the designers create a grey-scale design and the inventor approves it, the process is completed with a full color and texture, photo-realistic 3D design. Revisions can be made throughout the process and inventor feedback is welcomed as the product is never completed until complete satisfaction is reached. The best part is that the designs created are the sole property of the inventor. 
Why Idea Design Studio? 
The team works with the inventor every step of the way, with services including high quality design, quick and responsive turn-around, and proven suggestions from our experts. Additionally, the team has experience with branding and business identities, complete investor programs, and offers 24/7 customer support services. With constant communication and continual feedback, there is no question that this team is packed with resources, organization, and creative thinking. Idea Design Studio is ready to help in all areas of idea development. From developing your idea to marketing it, the services available are top-notch and professional. 
Idea Design Studio is a design firm that specializes in new product development. Jeff Weissand Marvin Powell lll, the company's managing directors, have worked in various areas of new product development since 2001. Jeff helped launch three successful industry-related companies since 2000, while Marvin got into the industry in 2002. Since 2006, Idea Design Studio has helped inventors handle such issues as product design, product development, patenting, marketing, licensing, and manufacturing. Communications with Idea Design Studio are 100 percent confidential. To learn more, call Idea Design Studio toll-free at 888-864-1780 or visit them online at www.ideadesignstudio.com .
